channel.title: Combat Level Bug
channel.description: I changed the Max xp to 995000000 and set the levels of my characters skills 0-19 all to 135... and now my character shows up with a 0 combat, and 99 in hp and runecrafting.... But all other skills show as 135 and kept the old level 99 xp... can anyone help fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 03:21:05 AM[/size][hr]Any ideas on being able to change combat level and skill level maxes?

item.title: Combat Level Bug
item.dc:creator: @chris13 chris13
item.description:
@chris13 wrote:

for the furture, if you work on another source…and you want to change the combat/skill lvl max just do this

for skills:
go to client.java and type in “return 99;” in find…this is the lvl max…just change that to the max lvl u want…eg lvl 135 and this will become the max skill lvl

For combat:
this is in player.java and you must fiddle around with the combat formula to get the desired combat…doesnt take long really just after the 1st time u will guess the right numbers…

[/*int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5); int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5); int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));/code] thats the formula i use and its 126cb with 99 skills =D

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Level Bug

item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Nevermind I fixed it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 03:35:38 AM[/size][hr]I had to change it 2-3 times in my character file for it to update finally. :]

item.title: Combat Level Bug
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

octavius:

I changed the Max xp to 995000000 and set the levels of my characters skills 0-19 all to 135… and now my character shows up with a 0 combat, and 99 in hp and runecrafting… But all other skills show as 135 and kept the old level 99 xp… can anyone help fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 03:21:05 AM[/size][hr]Any ideas on being able to change combat level and skill level maxes?

Dont Change Max Xp, Keep That The Same, Just Change The Level To 135, Works For Me. And I Aint Sure But, Maybe U Gotta DO It For All The Skills?

Lov3_rs_money

Read full topic
